Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed (fired red and very worn) below; top of rim glazed (worn); exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Many kantharoi Type B have painted inscriptions beneath the rim and several have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis (Williams 1983, 169). Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1693) (phase 2)
